Items.name: Wolf Threat
Items.desc: The increasing amount of wolf packs in the great plain threatens caravan, please reduce the number of them

Items.name: Too many bugs
Items.desc: I squshed a bug when I am travling on the great plain! Please help me to reduce the number of beetles there

Items.name: Werewolf danger
Items.desc: There are witnesses on werewolf on the plain, please go and defeat them

Items.name: Werewolf and wolf
Items.desc: The plain is very dangerous with wolves and werewolves every where, can someone defeat them?

Items.name: The boss of plain
Items.desc: An oger was witnessed in a certain cave in the plain, oger are extremely dangera and will causes massive threat to caravan. Please defeat it

Items.name: Potion required
Items.desc: The royal army demand potions for the wounded, if you have spare potion please consider doante to the army

Items.name: Resources required
Items.desc: The royal army demand resources to fortify the city, if you have spare resources please consider doante to the army
